conversation: Hi this is Debbie from the Family Dental Care office
Hi Debbie.
I’m calling to remind you about your appointment for a dental cleaning tomorrow
Oh, right! Could you remind me what time that is again?
Of course, your appointment is tomorrow morning at 9AM. We’ll see you then.
conversations.title: Hi, this is __ from __

conversations.usage: Ask to speak with a specific person
conversation: Hi, can I please speak with Daniel Bowers?
Sure! He’s in the other room, give me just a minute… Hello?
Hi Daniel! This is Jennifer, returning your call about the fundraiser.
Oh, hi! Thanks so much for giving me a call back.
conversations.title: Can I please speak with __?

conversations.usage: Explain the reason for your call
conversation: Hi, this is Sarah calling from Oak Ridge Elementary school.
Hi Sarah, what’s up?
I’m calling about your son. He’s not feeling well today, he’s got a bad stomachache.
Oh no, should I come pick him up?
Yes, I think that would be a good idea.
conversations.title: I’m calling about…

conversations.usage: Ask if the other person can talk right now.
conversation: Hi, this is Mary from Dr. Collin’s office. Is this Alice?
Hi, yes this is she.
I have your test results from the lab. Is now a good time to talk?
Yes, now is fine.
Great, Dr. Collin had a chance to review your labs this morning and everything looks normal.
conversations.title: Is now still a good time to talk?

conversation: Hello?
Hi Rachel, it’s Michelle. Do you have a minute to chat?
Hi Michelle! Actually I’m just heading out the door. Can I call you back later tonight?
Of course! I’ll be free after 6pm.
Great, I’ll give you a call back then!
conversations.title: Can I call you back __?

conversations.usage: Ask the other person to repeat what they said
conversation: Hi, can you please give me the address of your Mountain View location?
Sure, it’s 403 Castro Street
I’m sorry, could you repeat that?
The address is 403 Castro Street.
Got it, thanks!
conversations.title: I’m sorry, could you repeat that?

conversations.usage: Say this if you have a bad connection.
conversation: Hi, I’m calling to let you know that your photos are printed and ready for pickup. Will you be picking them up today?
Oh thanks, I might have to get them tomorrow...
I’m sorry, I’m having trouble hearing you.
Oh sorry, is this better?
Yes that’s much better, thanks!
conversations.title: I’m having trouble hearing you

conversations.usage: Leave your number on someone’s voicemail.
conversation: Hello?
I’m sorry, the person you are trying to reach is not available. Please leave a message after the tone.
Hi, I’m Teagan, calling from Practica. I have a message regarding your English coaching. Please give me a call back at 888-917-2593. Thanks! Have a great day.
conversations.title: Please give me a call back at __.

title: Phonecalls
